title: How pop band A-ha inspired Norway's electric car revolution
description: The band imported one of Norway's first EVs and launched a campaign of civil disobedience.

title: Liverpool 2-0 Napoli: Jurgen Klopp's side finish second in group despite win at Anfield
description: Liverpool end Napoli's flawless Champions League record with victory at Anfield but still have to settle for second place in Group A.

title: US midterm elections: Abortion will decide how I vote - here's why

title: Marseille 1-2 Tottenham: Spurs win Champions League group after last-gasp goal sinks Marseille
description: Tottenham go through as Champions League Group D winners after coming from behind in stoppage time to beat Marseille on a dramatic and frantic evening in France.

title: Ruthin: Four in hospital after helicopter crashes in woods
description: Police said none of them was believed to have suffered life threatening or life changing injuries.

description: Rangers set a new pointless record in the Champions League as Ajax consign them to a sixth straight defeat.

title: Elon Musk says $8 monthly fee for Twitter blue tick

description: England get their Rugby League World Cup campaign under way with thumping 66-4 win over Brazil in a carnival atmosphere at Headingley.
